result.eng: The project will be finished in a year.

result.eng: The problem was growing from year to year.

result.eng: They were still working at this time last year.

result.eng: it was a long year.

result.eng: We spent a year and a half doing that work.

result.eng: Let's welcome the new year.

result.eng: Where are you going on holiday this year?

result.eng: We do the same thing year after year.

result.eng: Many a person in this country doesn't read a book the whole year.
